products.title: PopUpShoe
products.author: Uranbileg Altangerel
products.description: Move like you want to #move, feel like you want to #feel, do what you want to #do. Because world is your oyster.

products.title: PopUpJewellery
products.author: Lucia Plevová
products.description: The whole cosmos #popup in #rings, #necklaces, #bracelets and #brooches. Those #burntcoals combined with #resin have created such unique #jewellery.

products.title: PopUpCinder
products.author: Branislav Glejtek
products.description: Basic material for the polygonal lights made of burnt wood ash reminds cinder. The #polygonal shape of the interior lights brings a piece of a #rock into the house.

products.title: Flower Pot
products.author: Tereza Čižmárová
products.description: The #flowerpot utilizes the #naturalfertilizingprinciple created by the #burning of the inner surface of the pot. The #glasspot effects roots and helps them to #growfaster.

products.title: PopUpChandelier
products.author: Eva Wirthová
products.description: A #chandelier that looks like a #glass jewellery box and is a symbol of something special to us we have to #protect. Thereby wood is becoming a #precious material we placed it in. #glass symbolizes the #fragility of natural balance.

products.title: PopUpCoffin
products.author: Jiří Maxmilián Blšták
products.description: This #coffin for pets with a growing #tree is a symbol of #continuity and #newlife. It is also a gentle #memory of those you loved and who are gone.

products.title: PopUpDesk
products.author: Karolína Fardová
products.description: #hairytable livens up every interior. This #fury friend is #foldable so it may be also handy as a #carpet placed on the floor or a wall.

products.title: PopUpStool
products.author: Kateřina Brůhová
products.description: What if we #reverse the #recyclingprocess? A table made from #paperwood #shifts the #ecologicalapproach.

products.title: PopUpTable
products.author: Veronika Zelezníková
products.description: Inspiration #popup in frozen #nature where everything is #stable. The rough look of #woodenbranches combined with #resin brings the wildness of nature to the interior.

products.title: PopUpRadiator
products.author: Lukáš Uliarczyk
products.description: #siton or look at the #3Dprinted #wooden #radiator and warm yourself up. And if it’s not enough, fire up this #hotspot.

products.title: PopUpSpeakers
products.author: Lucia Kubišová
products.description: These stylish #speakers upgrade every #party to an unforgettable #soundexperience.

products.title: PopUpLamp
products.author: Daniel Szöllösi
products.description: The interior wooden #lamp is geometrically divided in the middle by a #glass plate. The #glassedge is lit and creates an impressive effect.

products.title: PopUpLight
products.author: Lucia Regásková
products.description: The #glass bubble of #light reminds a wooden #soul, which is an olden symbol of energy and spirituality. Wood and glass #live so #together in mutual #symbiosis.
